
The main python packaging website is https://packaging.python.org/en/latest/

The tutorial on packaging your python code is at https://packaging.python.org/en/latest/tutorials/packaging-projects/

The website https://packaging.python.org/en/latest/guides/ contains more info.


```
conda create -n pack python
```
or
```
conda create -n pack python=3.14
```


```
conda activate pack
```


```
python -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel
```
```
python -m pip install --upgrade build
```



https://packaging.python.org/en/latest/guides/using-testpypi/


https://packaging.python.org/en/latest/specifications/pypirc/
